name: Hidden Mysteries World
description:
Discover mysteries of explored lands. Go through stunning landscapes, wild nature, and forgotten caves of Egypt, Himalaya and Northern land in our new hidden object game -Hidden Mysteries World.
Enjoy searching for objects in colorful exotic locations. Explore the world of hidden objects and mysteries, resolve all quests and find your way to their best kept secrets. Different game modes, cleverly hidden objects and increasing difficulty will make your adventure nice, relaxing and challenging.

Game features:
- Hidden object mystery game
- Three stories from three parts of the globe
- Over 100 hidden object scenes
- 48 unique locations
- More than 20 Bonus scenes
- Over 1500 objects hidden in the game
- Three different play modes: Picture, Silhouette, Word
- Zoomable scenes
- Scrollable panel with objects to find
- New visual effects, HD quality of graphics
- Amazing sound effects
- Climatic music closely related with the theme of the game
